# APP product category network configuration guidance

## Batch save

**Interface address**:`/business-iot/v1/appProductTypeGuide/batchSave`

**Request method**: `POST`

**Request data type**: `application/json`

**Response data type**: `*/*`

**Interface Description**:

**Request Example**:

```javascript
[
  {
    "appId": "",
    "configDTO": {
      "buttonText": "",
      "radioText": "",
      "showRadio": true,
      "steps": [
        {
          "aspectRatio": "",
          "imageUrl": "",
          "sortNum": 0,
          "text": ""
        }
      ],
      "subTitle": "",
      "title": ""
    },
    "guideId": "",
    "guideImage": "",
    "guideVideo": "",
    "is5g": true,
    "isShow": 0,
    "mustWifiPwd": true,
    "netModel": 0,
    "refId": ""
  }
]
```

**Request Parameters**:

| Parameter name | Parameter description | Request type | Required | Data type | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | -------- | -------- | ------ |
|list|APP category distribution network guide|body|true|array|AppProductTypeGuideDTO|
|  appId|Application ID||false|string||
|  configDTO|Configuration information||false|ConfigDTO|ConfigDTO|
|    buttonText|Button text||false|string||
|    radioText|Radio text||false|string||
|    showRadio|Show radio button||false|boolean||
|    steps|Step list||false|array|Step|
|      aspectRatio|Extended information||false|string||
|      imageUrl|Image address||false|string||
|&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;sortNum|序号||false|integer||
|&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;text|文案||false|string||
|    subTitle|Subtitle||false|string||
|&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;&emsp;title|标题||false|string||
|  guideId|Network configuration guide ID||false|string||
|  guideImage|Network image||false|string||
|  guideVideo|Network configuration video||false|string||
|  is5g|Does it support 5G||false|boolean||
|  isShow|Whether to display (0 no, 1 yes), default 1||false|integer||
|  mustWifiPwd|Is it necessary to enter the WIFI password?||false|boolean||
|  netModel|Network configuration mode: 1:WIFI+BLE; 2:WIFI; 3:BLE; 4:QrCode; 5:Barcode; 6:AP; 7:Wired;||false|integer||
|  refId|Association ID (when appId=0, associate with the third-level category ID, otherwise associate with the app distribution network category ID)||false|string||

**Response Status**:

| Status code | Description | Schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- | 
|200|OK|ResponseResult object«boolean»|
|201|Created||
|401|Unauthorized||
|403|Forbidden||
|404|Not Found||

**Response parameters**:


| Parameter name | Parameter description | Type | schema |
| -------- | -------- | ----- |----- | 
|code|Response status code|integer(int32)|integer(int32)|
|data|Response data|boolean||
|message|Response message|string||
|reqId|Request ID|string||
|time|Request timestamp (10 bits)|integer(int64)|integer(int64)|


**Sample response**:
```javascript
{
	"code": 200,
	"data": true,
	"message": "success",
	"reqId": "4a0ede228f9f6fac",
	"time": 1620641786
}
```
